lifecycle.sourceOfTruth: audiense zeroheight pagination page (captured image reference) + titan.css pagination tokens
lifecycle.usageRule: Implement Pagination from source contract first. If docs/rules/spec conflict, source-of-truth wins.
lifecycle.migrationTrigger: Sync local docs/rules/spec whenever pagination source updates.

pagination.description: Pagination controls navigation across large result sets with previous/next and page items.

canonicalTerminology.rule: Use canonical names in docs/rules/contracts; avoid aliases.

structure.a11yRule: Use nav landmark with aria-label and expose current page semantics.

interaction.navigation: Page selection via click or keyboard. Previous/next update current page by one step.
interaction.keyboard: Tab navigates interactive controls; Enter/Space activate control.
interaction.focus: Visible focus state is mandatory on all interactive controls.
interaction.disabled: Previous disabled on first page; next disabled on last page.

default-pagination.description: Previous/next controls with visible page-button range and optional ellipsis-item.
default-pagination.useCase: Large lists where direct page jump is useful.

simple-pagination.description: Compact previous/next control with reduced visible page range.

useCases: Reporting lists with large result sets.
Any flow where users need stable position awareness across pages.

layout.alignment: Center-aligned row for controls with consistent spacing rhythm.
layout.overflow: Keep controls on one row where possible; collapse middle pages with ellipsis-item if needed.

border.rule: Pagination controls follow Titan button visual policy: no border/stroke/outline as container styling.

cssExpectation.outline: none (except focus ring token where applicable)

blockingRules: If required pagination anatomy or semantics cannot be satisfied, return BLOCKER.
If required states are missing, return FAIL.
If more than one page-button can be selected at once, return FAIL.
If pagination controls use border/stroke/outline as container styling, return FAIL.
reviewScenarios: Render pagination with visible default/hover/selected/disabled states.
Demonstrate previous disabled on first page and next disabled on last page.
Demonstrate keyboard focus + activation for page and nav buttons.
Demonstrate long range with ellipsis-item behavior.
a11yAcceptance: Pagination is wrapped in nav landmark with aria-label.
Focus-visible appears on all interactive controls.

fail: Any required visible state is missing in review harness.
More than one page appears selected.
Previous/next disabled logic is incorrect at bounds.
blocker: Missing semantic token mapping for hover/selected/disabled/focus states.
